title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for the Waterways
purpose: The APPG champions the revitalisation and restoration of the UK’s navigable waterways. Our purpose is to unlock the environmental, social, economic, and cultural potential of the UK’s rivers and canals by boosting local economies, promoting sustainability and connecting people to nature.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 0463.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Charlie Norman, The Inland Waterways Association. Tel: 01494 783 453
contact_details.secretariat: Inland Waterways Association acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.waterways.org.uk/
